text: melum, avarkalil oru kuttattar (matinavacikalai nokki)"yasrip vacikale! (Pakaivarkalai etirttu) unkalal urutiyaka nirka mutiyatu, atalal ninkal tirumpic cenru vitunkal" enru kuriyapotu, avarkalil (marrum) oru pirivinar; "niccayamaka enkalutaiya vitukal patukapparra nilaiyil irukkinrana" enru - avai patukapparrataka illata nilaiyilum - kuri, (porkkalattiliruntu cenruvita) napiyitam anumati korinarkal - ivarkal (porkkalattiliruntu tappi) otavatait tavira (veretaiyum) natavillai
